title: Leaverbuster, Pls riot
body:
My pc usually crashes when i play LoL, first time i got the punishment, that's fine, but after i clear all of them and go to ranked game, my pc freeze and have to restart again, and the new feature "Remake" comes in and i get more 20 minutes wait per game again after just finished it off
Pls, Riot, For love of god and everything{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: These [lower priority queues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)can give you the time needed to troubleshoot whatever is causing you to leave matches.  The only way to remove these is by playing consistently without issues.  I'd like to help but need more information on your exact issue.  For example, what do you mean exactly by pc crashes?  What are you seeing and when is it happening?  Do you get any error messages?  Let me know!
